title: How to Stop a Rocking Chair from Moving Across the Floor

steps.headline: Cut strips of velvet the length of the chair rockers that touch the floor.
Turn the rocking chair over or sideways.
Glue a strip to each side.
steps.description: Allow to dry according to the glue instructions and leave the rocking chair upright to allow for air circulation.

steps.headline: Turn the chair back over once the glue has dried.
Test the chair.
steps.description: It should now stay in place.

text: Cut strips of velvet the length of the chair rockers that touch the floor.  Turn the rocking chair over or sideways.  Glue a strip to each side. Allow to dry according to the glue instructions and leave the rocking chair upright to allow for air circulation. Turn the chair back over once the glue has dried.  Test the chair. It should now stay in place.
